subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Oscar Gatto fought off a late charge from race favorite Alberto Contador to win the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Pieter Weening kept the overall lead.
snippet: Oscar Gatto fought off a late charge from race favorite Alberto Contador to win the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Pieter Weening kept the overall lead.
